= Documentation =

The first command is 'thone'. The other commands won't be available until you run 'thone'. 

== Implemented commands==

  * [thone] - start the shell
  * [sms] - send, read and manage sms
  * [call] - dial, read and manage calls
  * [ppl] - manage your addressbook
  * [toggle] - switch things on, off or in custom states
  * [thonedbus thone-dbus] - python dbus connection
